abstract: Study published in journal Science Translational Medicine reports dengue vaccine jointly developed by National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases and Food and Drug Administration has worked almost perfectly in trial in which participants were infected with mild form of disease.

headline.print_headline: Experimental Vaccine Shows Promise in Fighting a Form of Dengue, a Study Says
headline.main: Experimental Vaccine Shows Promise Against a Form of Dengue

keywords.value: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A study of 41 volunteers showed that all 21 who got the vaccine and were deliberately infected with a mild form of dengue did not have any replicating virus.
lead_paragraph: A study of 41 volunteers showed that all 21 who got the vaccine and were deliberately infected with a mild form of dengue did not have any replicating virus.
